overall.description: Compute the 2-dimensional inverse FFT of a real array.

s.description: Shape of the real output to the inverse FFT.

axes.description: The axes over which to compute the inverse fft. Default is the last two axes.

norm.description: New in version 1.10.0.  Normalization mode (see numpy.fft). Default is None.

out.description: The result of the inverse real 2-D FFT.
